name: gems3k
doc: Apache Thrift IDL definition for the gems3k records interface

fields.name: M0i
fields.doc: Atomic (molar) mass of Independent Component

fields.name: S0i
fields.doc: Standard-state absolute entropy S0 per g/atom

fields.name: Cp0i
fields.doc: Standard-state absolute heat capacity Cp0 per g/atom

fields.name: V0i
fields.doc: Standard state volume V0 per g/atom

fields.name: Ri
fields.doc: Ionic radius Angstrom

fields.name: IXi
fields.doc: Relative isotope abundance (1 for chemical elements)

fields.name: Valen
fields.doc: Default valence number (formula charge) of IC in compounds

fields.name: indMT
fields.doc: Index in Periodical (Mendeleev's) Table of chemical elements

fields.name: Zi
fields.doc: Default coordination number in compounds

fields.name: StdSt
fields.doc: Code of standard aggregate state

fields.name: ICname
fields.doc: Name of this Independent Component (stoichiometry unit)

fields.name: ICform
fields.doc: Chemical formula of this Independent Component

fields.name: IC_DC
fields.doc: Reference DComp record key

fields.name: temp_import
fields.doc: Field for storing temporary values needed during import script

fields.name: TPcMod
fields.doc: Method of calculation and other properties

fields.name: DCset
fields.doc: Default DC class code

fields.name: Cdate
fields.doc: Date when this DC definition was created or substantionally modified

fields.name: Zz
fields.doc: Formula charge of this species (Dependent Component)

fields.name: M0
fields.doc: Molecular (gram-formula) mass, g/mol

fields.name: V0d
fields.doc: Molar volume V0 of Dependent Component at standard state (J/bar), uncertainty

fields.name: G0d
fields.doc: Standard molar (partial molal) Gibbs energy of formation of DC from IC at Tr and Pr, uncertainty

fields.name: H0d
fields.doc: Molar (partial molal) enthalpy of formation of DC from IC at standard state and Tr, Pr (J/mol), uncertainty

fields.name: S0d
fields.doc: Absolute molar (partial molal) entropy of Dependent Component at the standard state, uncertainty

fields.name: Cp0d
fields.doc: Absolute molar (partial molal) isobaric heat capacity Cp0 of DC at standard state and reference Tr, Pr, uncertainty

fields.name: PrTr
fields.doc: Reference pressure Pr (bar), Reference temperature Tr, C

fields.name: LamST
fields.doc: Entropy of lambda transition (J/K/mol), Temperature of lambda transition (C), minerals only

fields.name: BetAlp
fields.doc: Coefficient of isothermal compressibility b_, Coefficient of isobaric expansibility a

fields.name: ab
fields.doc: Ion-size parameter ao (Debye-Hueckel), Individual parameter b (optional)

fields.name: DCname
fields.doc: Full name of Dependent Component (species)

fields.name: DCform
fields.doc: Chemical formula (stoichiometry) of Dependent Component (species)

fields.name: DC_cnt
fields.doc: Number of Cp=f(T) equations, phase transitions, references, EOS coefficients

fields.name: TCint
fields.doc: Lower/Upper temperature validity limit(s) (deg.C) for Cp = f (T) equation

fields.name: aiCpT
fields.doc: Coefficients of the terms of general Cp = f(T) equation

fields.name: aiNEs
fields.doc: Empirical coefficients for non-electrolyte aqueous species

fields.name: aiHKF
fields.doc: Empirical coefficients of the HKF EoS

fields.name: aiVTP
fields.doc: Coefficients of the molar volume equation

fields.name: CritPg
fields.doc: Parameters for the PRSV fluid model

fields.name: aiODc
fields.doc: Coeffs of Birch-Murnaghan (1988) V(T,P) equation

fields.name: FT_p
fields.doc: Parameters of phase transitions

fields.name: FT_pb
fields.doc: Properties of phase transition (Berman): Tr; Tft; tilt; l1,l2

fields.name: Cemp_s
fields.doc: Empirical CG EOS coefficients

fields.name: FT_typ
fields.doc: List of phase transition type codes

fields.name: dSDref
fields.doc: List of SDref record keys to data source bibliography

fields.name: dSDval
fields.doc: List of comments to data sources

fields.name: temp_import
fields.doc: Field for storing temporary values needed during import script

structs.name: ReacDCData
structs.doc: Struct of reaction and reaction-defined DC (species) data

fields.name: REcMod
fields.doc: Method of calculation and other properties

fields.name: RE_set
fields.doc: Default class code of new DC defined in this reaction and units codes

fields.name: RE_arr
fields.doc: Flags for the logK=f(T) and other coefficient arrays allocation

fields.name: rCdat
fields.doc: Date when this ReacDC definition was created

fields.name: Zz_
fields.doc: Formula charge of a new species (Dependent Component)

fields.name: M0_
fields.doc: Molecular (gram-formula) mass of the new DC (species), g/mol

fields.name: logKr
fields.doc: The equilibrium constant K of reaction,  log K of reaction at Tr, Pr, uncertainty of logK

fields.name: G0r
fields.doc: dGr, standard molar Gibbs energy of formation G0 of new DC, dev(G0) (J/mol)

fields.name: H0r
fields.doc: dHr, standard molar enthalpy of formation H0 of the new DC, dev(H0) (J/mol)

fields.name: S0r
fields.doc: dSr, absolute molar entropy S0 of the new DC, dev(S0) (J/K/mol)

fields.name: Cp0r
fields.doc: dCpr, absolute molar isobaric heat capacity Cp0 of the new DC, dev(Cp0) (J/K/mol)

fields.name: V0r
fields.doc: dVr, molar volume V0 of DC, dev(V0) (J/bar)

fields.name: NisoX
fields.doc: Mole fraction of counter-isotope in natural mixture

fields.name: PrTr_
fields.doc: Reference pressure Pr (bar), temperature Tr (C)

fields.name: BetAl_
fields.doc: Coefficients of isothermal compressibility b, of isobaric expansibility a

fields.name: ab_
fields.doc: Ion-size parameter ao, individual parameter b

fields.name: RDname
fields.doc: Full name of reaction and reaction-defined DC (species)

fields.name: RDform
fields.doc: Chemical formula of reaction-defined new DC (species)

fields.name: REsDC
fields.doc: List of DC record keys (species names) involved in the reaction

fields.name: REmDC
fields.doc: Codes of sources of standard thermodynamic properties {n r d f i}

fields.name: RE_dim
fields.doc: Number of species, coeffs of logK, coeffs of dVr and other sizes

fields.name: SC_DC
fields.doc: Stoichiometry coefficients of species (DC) in the reaction (reactants < 0, products > 0)

fields.name: TCint_
fields.doc: Input interval of temperatures of the logK validity range; or vector of T values for logK interpolation

fields.name: P_int
fields.doc: Input interval of pressures of the logK validity range; or vector of P values for logK interpolation

fields.name: adCpT
fields.doc: Empirical coefficients of dCpr = f(T) equation

fields.name: adHKF
fields.doc: Coeffs a1-a4, c1,c2, w, rAB for HKF EOS of reaction

fields.name: adVTP
fields.doc: Coefficients for dVr = f(P,T) equation

fields.name: a_dST
fields.doc: Coefficients for the modified Ryzhenko-Bryzgalin electrostatic model

fields.name: aiLgKr
fields.doc: Coefficients of logK = f(T) equation

fields.name: logKPT
fields.doc: Input array of logK(Pi,Ti) values for logK interpolation

fields.name: rSDref
fields.doc: List SDref recortd keys to data source bibliography

fields.name: rSDval
fields.doc: List of comments to data sources

fields.name: temp_import
fields.doc: Field for storing temporary values needed during import script

fields.name: p_solt
fields.doc: Code of phase-solution type and model of (non)ideal mixing and other properties

fields.name: Ph_Ps
fields.doc: Code of this phase aggregate state in the system and allocation flags

fields.name: Ph_Nc
fields.doc: Number of Dependent Components and number of references to Data Sources

fields.name: Ph_ncp
fields.doc: Number of rows and columns (coefficients per parameter) in the ph_cf array

fields.name: Ph_npx
fields.doc: Number of columns (max. order of interaction parameter) in ipxT index list

fields.name: Ph_nsc
fields.doc: Number of columns (properties and coefficients per end member) in dc_cf array

fields.name: Ph_nsi
fields.doc: Number of active surface patches/types, number of different substituting moieties

fields.name: kin_t
fields.doc: Type of adsorption/ ion exchange/ polyelectrolyte isotherm model and other kinetic properties

fields.name: Pdqf
fields.doc: Flag for dqfp array for DC-related DQF parameter coefficients and other allocation flags

fields.name: PEIpc
fields.doc: Flag for EIpc array of EIL model parameter coefficients and other flags

fields.name: PrpCon
fields.doc: Flag for rpCon array of kinetic rate constants and other flags

fields.name: nlPh
fields.doc: Number of linked phases and other sizes

fields.name: numpC
fields.doc: Number of parallel reactions that affect amount constraints for k-th phase and other

fields.name: nEIl
fields.doc: Number of electrostatic model layers and other

fields.name: nIsoC
fields.doc: Number of isotherm parameter coefficients per surface species DC and other

fields.name: Vpor
fields.doc: Specific pore volume of (carrier) phase, m3/g; Fraction of surface area; Fraction of phase pore volume

fields.name: psdC
fields.doc: Permanent surface charge density (eq/m2), Donnan volume charge density (eq/m3), Ion exchange capacity (eg/g)

fields.name: PhName
fields.doc: Full name of this phase definition

fields.name: PhNote
fields.doc: Comment to PhName

fields.name: DisPar
fields.doc: phase specific surface area, m2/g, Sig0, SigG and other properties

fields.name: SCM_C
fields.doc: Classifier of EIL models applied to surface patches/types

fields.name: XfIEC
fields.doc: Density of permanent surface charge, mkeq/m2 (for electrostatic SCMs)

fields.name: MsDt
fields.doc: Common maximum density of competitive surface complexes, 1/nm2; SAT FFG parameters

fields.name: Cap_t
fields.doc: inner EDL capacitance density parameter, F/m2; outer EDL capacitance density parameter, F/m2; anion C for BSM

fields.name: SAT_C
fields.doc: Surface species: Codes of SACT applied to site type or species and other table

fields.name: MaSDj
fields.doc: Parameters for surface activity coefficent terms SACT

fields.name: ipxT
fields.doc: List of indexation of interaction parameters of mixing models given in the ph_cf array

fields.name: FSI_t
fields.doc: Fraction of surface patch (type) relative to the whole surface of the sorbent

fields.name: ph_cf
fields.doc: Array of interaction parameter coefficients for the phase-solution non-ideal mixing model

fields.name: dc_cf
fields.doc: Array of coefficients of end-member (species) properties for the non-ideal mixing model

fields.name: pDC_v_
fields.doc: List of source DComp or ReacDC record keys for species included into this phase

fields.name: PhDCC
fields.doc: DC classes of species included into this phase

fields.name: PhDCS
fields.doc: Location of source records for Dependent Components (species)

fields.name: PhEq
fields.doc: Math script to calculate T,P-corrected parameters and properties (for user-defined non-ideal mixing models)

fields.name: DcEq
fields.doc: Math script to compute activity coefficients of phase components (for user-defined non-ideal mixing models)

fields.name: pSDref
fields.doc: List of SDef keys to data sources or comments to this Phase definition

fields.name: pSDval
fields.doc: Comments to SDref keys to data sources

fields.name: xSmD
fields.doc: Denticity of surface species per surface site (site allocation)

fields.name: ocPRk
fields.doc: Operation code for kinetic 'parallel reaction' affinity term; Index of particle face

fields.name: lPhc
fields.doc: Array of phase linkage parameters

fields.name: DQFc
fields.doc: Aarray of DQF parameters for DCs in phases

fields.name: rcpc
fields.doc: Array of reciprocal parameters for DCs in phases

fields.name: EIpc
fields.doc: Array of electrostatic model parameter coefficients per EI layer

fields.name: CDc
fields.doc: Array of electrostatic model coefficients per surface species

fields.name: IsoP
fields.doc: Array of isotherm parameter coefficients per surface species

fields.name: IsoS
fields.doc: Array of isotherm parameter coefficients per surface site

fields.name: feSAr
fields.doc: Fractions of surface area of the solid related to different parallel reactions

fields.name: rpCon
fields.doc: Array of parameters for 'parallel reactions'

fields.name: umpCon
fields.doc: UUKM uptake model parameters

fields.name: lPh
fields.doc: List of record keys of linked phases

fields.name: lDCr
fields.doc: List of record keys of species involved in activity product terms for parallel reactions

fields.name: lDCd
fields.doc: Location of source records for Dependent Components (species)

fields.name: dcpcl
fields.doc: DC parameter coefficients comment list

fields.name: ipicl
fields.doc: Interaction parameter indexes comment list

fields.name: ipccl
fields.doc: Interaction parameter coefficients comment list

fields.name: rpkcl
fields.doc: Kinetic rate constants comment list

fields.name: rprcl
fields.doc: Kinetic parallel reactions comment list

fields.name: umpcl
fields.doc: Uptake kinetic model parameters comment list

fields.name: smcDl
fields.doc: Sorption model parameters comment list per DC

fields.name: smcSl
fields.doc: Sorption model parameters comment list per site

fields.name: eimPl
fields.doc: EIL model CD parameters comment list per DC

fields.name: eimLl
fields.doc: EIL model parameters comment list per layer

fields.name: lPhC
fields.doc: Phase linkage type codes

fields.name: IsoC
fields.doc: Isotherm/SATC code for this surface site type 2

fields.name: ixsolv
fields.doc: Array of indexes of solvent interaction parameters

fields.name: ixdiel
fields.doc: Array of indexes of dielectric interaction parameters

fields.name: solvc
fields.doc: Array of solvent interaction parameters

fields.name: dielc
fields.doc: Array of dielectric constant parameters

fields.name: dhc
fields.doc: Array of generic DH parameters

fields.name: apCon
fields.doc: Array of parameters per species involved in activity product terms

fields.name: Ascp
fields.doc: Parameters of SSA corrections for growth/dissolution

fields.name: lICu
fields.doc: List of names of Independent Components characteristic for end members

fields.name: temp_import
fields.doc: Field for storing temporary values needed during import script

fields.name: _id
fields.doc: id of this query record or 0 if unknown

fields.name: _key
fields.doc: ID of this record within the impex collection (part of _id)

fields.name: _rev
fields.doc: Code of revision (changed by the system at every update)

fields.name: _type
fields.doc: This field must contain "vertex"

fields.name: _label
fields.doc: This label is "icomp" for all icomps: goes into the name of collection in ArangoDB

fields.name: project
fields.doc: Name of project

fields.name: key
fields.doc: List of key fields to IComp records

fields.name: dod
fields.doc: Properties of IComp as embedded object

fields.doc: id of this query record or 0 if unknown

fields.name: _key
fields.doc: ID of this record within the impex collection (part of _id)

fields.name: _rev
fields.doc: Code of revision (changed by the system at every update)

fields.name: _type
fields.doc: This field must contain "vertex"

fields.name: _label
fields.doc: This label is "dcomp" for all dcomps: goes into the name of collection in ArangoDB

fields.name: project
fields.doc: Name of project

fields.name: key
fields.doc: List of key fields to DComp records

fields.name: dod
fields.doc: Properties of DComp as embedded object

fields.name: _id
fields.doc: id of this query record or 0 if unknown

fields.name: _key
fields.doc: ID of this record within the impex collection (part of _id)

fields.name: _rev
fields.doc: Code of revision (changed by the system at every update)

fields.name: _type
fields.doc: This field must contain "vertex"

fields.name: _label
fields.doc: This label is "reacdc" for all reacdcs: goes into the name of collection in ArangoDB

fields.name: project
fields.doc: Name of project

fields.name: key
fields.doc: List of key fields to ReacDC records

fields.name: dod
fields.doc: Properties of ReacDC as embedded object

fields.name: _id
fields.doc: id of this query record or 0 if unknown

fields.name: _key
fields.doc: ID of this record within the impex collection (part of _id)

fields.name: _rev
fields.doc: Code of revision (changed by the system at every update)

fields.name: _type
fields.doc: This field must contain "vertex"

fields.name: _label
fields.doc: This label is "phase" for all phase: goes into the name of collection in ArangoDB

fields.name: project
fields.doc: Name of project

fields.doc: List of key fields to Phase records

fields.doc: Properties of Phase as embedded object
